content: the pattern includes * 8 pages of detailed explanations step by step * a lot of pictures of the process * description of the knit shirt * beautiful design in pdf language english crochet terms - us size of the toy 25 cm 10 yarn crochet cat toy is done with himalaya dolphin baby crochet hook 4 mm the shirt is done with gazzal baby cotton knit needles 3 5mm the size of the toy is depending on the size of hook and yarn you use level easy
